title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Digital Game-Based Computer Science Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts (variables, conditionals, loops, etc.) and algorithms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Complete a digital matching game applying data structure and algorithm concepts with over 80% accuracy
Improve computer science problem-solving skills by 30% through game-based learning activities

Over 1–6 months, learners complete three project-based assessments (algorithm optimization, web application development, data analysis system design), submitting deliverables meeting ≥70% of each project’s criteria (functionality 40%, creativity 30%, implementation completeness 30%) to demonstrate creative problem-solving in computer science
Achieve a 15% or higher increase in learning motivation index on the MSLQ survey
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
